com.seclass.snappat.base

接口 BaseView

  • 所有已知子接口:
    HomeView, LoginView, MineView, NormalView, NotifyView
    所有已知实现类:
    BaseActivity, BaseFragment, HomeFragment, LoginActivity, MainActivity, MineFragment, NotifyFragment, WelcomeActivity

    public interface BaseView
    Interface BaseView.

    Basic interface for all activity view.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    作者:
    Sen Wang
